programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons) S1 (26/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons»Jonathan has lost his balloon, Paddington tries to get him a new one but accidentally ends up flying all over London. How will he get down? Pigeonton get help! // After a neighborhood watch talk Paddington decides to go on patrol as an unofficial policeman. Soon he has to solve a real crime but who is the litterbug?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Fire Engine / Paddington Joins a Club) S1 (19/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Fire Engine / Paddington Joins a Club»Paddington is impressed by a safety talk from the local fire brigade. When there is a real emergency, Paddington to the rescue! // Mateo and Judy form a secret club in the treehouse but won't let Jonathan and Paddington join without a password.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La journée des jeunes talents) S3 (20/52)
programme.desc: «La journée des jeunes talents»C'est la Journée du talent à la garderie de Peppa. Madame Gazelle veut que chacun montre à la classe son talent particulier...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage sur la Lune) S3 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage sur la Lune»Peppa et George partent avec maman Cochon à la présentation par mademoiselle Lapin du camion des mamans sapeurs pompiers...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Grand-père à l'aire de jeux) S3 (22/52)
programme.desc: «Grand-père à l'aire de jeux»Papa Pig perd son titre de Champion de saut de flaques durant les Papa-Olympics. Tout le monde l'aide à s'entraîner en vue des prochains Papa-Olympics...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Goldie, le poisson rouge) S3 (23/52)
programme.desc: «Goldie, le poisson rouge»Goldie le poisson n'a pas l'air heureux et ne mange pas sa nourriture, alors Peppa, George et Maman Cochon l'emmènent faire un tour en bus pour voir le docteur Hamster, le vétérinaire...

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Robot Toutou !) S6 (12/29)
programme.desc: «Robot Toutou !»Robo Puppy!: When a bossy cyborg named the Glitch hacks all the robots in Robotopolis and forces them to dance "The Robot," it's up to Robot Mechanic Molly and Robo Puppy to stop him! (S6, ep 7).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Into the Blueniverse) S4 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Into the Blueniverse»Into the Blueniverse!: It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into the Blueniverse! Where has it gone? (S3, ep 17).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Rainbow Puppy's Skidoo Adventure) S3 (12/18)
programme.desc: «Rainbow Puppy's Skidoo Adventure»Josh and Blue are having a playdate with our friend Rainbow Puppy, who makes everything extra exciting! We play a special game of Rainbow Puppy's Clues to figure out where she wants to go, leaping from skidoo to skidoo and looking for clues.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Le Carnaval / Le Cheval des Mers) S1 (21/21)
programme.desc: «Le Carnaval / Le Cheval des Mers»The biggest party of the year could be cancelled after Escarlata la Pirata freezes the high seas! // Bonnie Bones is on the run with the museum's priceless treasures, but Santi and crew won't let her get far.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Le chat de la jungle) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Le chat de la jungle»The Ocelot's Tale: A fun sleepover in Larimar's Museum turns into an adventure when one of the pieces of art comes to life. (S2, ep 7b).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Baby, super requin) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Baby, super requin»Vigo's evil plot to turn everyfishy in Carnivore Cove into babies backfires when toddlers Super Shark and Captain Kelp turn out to be a finful.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Medievel Tides) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Medievel Tides»When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Popcorn) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Popcorn»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le tresor du palais de glace / Au secours de Ryder) S8 (9/24)
programme.desc: «Le tresor du palais de glace / Au secours de Ryder»Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in search of an Antarctic treasure but they all need rescued when they get stranded on shore. // The pups need to rescue Ryder and Alex when they get out of control on a rocket-powered ATV.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (La grande décision de Paddington) S2 (6/27)
programme.desc: «La grande décision de Paddington»Paddington and the Big Decision: On the last day of the school holidays, Jonathan and Judy can't agree on what to do, so Paddington has the casting vote. (S2, ep 7a).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le petit train de Papy Pig) S2 (32/52)
programme.desc: «Le petit train de Papy Pig»When Peppa's friends come to play in her tree house, it's super fun, but when the boys come, things go wrong. Peppa unceremoniously puts them out. Grandpa knows what to do and builds a castle hut for the boys, but whether it makes it more fun?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Excursion en montagne) S2 (38/52)
programme.desc: «Excursion en montagne»Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chloé and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chloé have a great idea;.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La maison de Rebecca Rabbit) S2 (39/52)
programme.desc: «La maison de Rebecca Rabbit»Peppa and her entire class go on a school trip to the mountains. There they discover the ultrasound, exchange their lunch and have a wonderful day. And before they get back they also sing the Bing-Bong song!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Trip to the Moon) S1 (25/78)
programme.desc: «The Trip to the Moon»Christopher dreams to visit the moon so his friends make his wish come true. Bubu makes a rocket ship in cardboard and the friends make Christopher an outfit with everything he will need during the trip to the moon.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Spider) S1 (26/78)
programme.desc: «The Spider»Anna and Froga are completely freaked out when they learn a spider lives in Ron's treehouse with him! Ron tries his best to convince his friends that the spider is harmless.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Feelin' Filipino) S3 (18/18)
programme.desc: «Feelin' Filipino»Lola is missing her hometown in the Philippines, so Josh surprises her by bringing the Philippines to the house! We explore Filipino culture and family traditions as we play Blue's Clues.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Katie rejoint la Pat'patrouille / Les poiossons-pattes) S8 (10/24)
programme.desc: «Katie rejoint la Pat'patrouille / Les poiossons-pattes»When Mayor Humdinger disrupts Adventure Bay with his "barking" kitties, Katie and the pups must rescue the town.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La cloche de plongée) S2 (4/26)
programme.desc: «La cloche de plongée»While the Turbots are deep sea diving, their diving bell ends up stuck! PAW Patrol to the rescue!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La roue de Métal / Le bongo de Bobbi) S2 (16/20)
programme.desc: «La roue de Métal / Le bongo de Bobbi»When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La fontaine mystérieuse / La soirée des lumières disco) S2 (n°17)
programme.desc: «La fontaine mystérieuse / La soirée des lumières disco»Who has put a new fountain in Crystal Lake which is against Park Rules? And it's upsetting Fish Hook! // Sir Steel thinks the deer have stolen Steel Tower's lights, so decides to take theirs with his new Light Sucker!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Builds a Scarecrow / Paddington Plays Hide and Seek) S1 (27/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Builds a Scarecrow / Paddington Plays Hide and Seek»Paddington accidentally ruins Mr. Browns lovely lawn and must repair it. But the birds take a liking to the seeds so he builds a Scarecrow. // Mrs. Bird is a champion hide and seeker but where is she? Paddington, Jonathan and Judy mus go find her.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Quesadillas) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Quesadillas»Quesadillas: Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favourite jar of salsa open, no matter how hard he and his friends try! (S1, ep 7b).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen) S1 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen»Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Pour maman / Barbacarambolage) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Pour maman / Barbacarambolage»The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Captain Varech / Riquiqui le Tardigrade) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Captain Varech / Riquiqui le Tardigrade»As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le Sorcier Glacé) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Le Sorcier Glacé»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Party Time) S1 (22/78)
programme.desc: «Party Time»Anna and Froga want to throw a party..... since it is not a particular party day they decide to celebrate "Tomato Day", But Christopher ate all of the tomatoes ... so they need to find another name... Anna finds the perfect name: Friendship party!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Squeaky Boots) S1 (n°66)
programme.desc: «The Squeaky Boots»The Squeaky Boots: Christopher leads the friends in a fun game of hide and seek, but Froga soon realizes that her new boots are letting out a noisy squeak! (S1, ep 66).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Longchair for Ron) S1 (n°68)
programme.desc: «A Longchair for Ron»A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubu's New Blue Jeans) S1 (n°71)
programme.desc: «Bubu's New Blue Jeans»Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Blue Butterfly) S1 (n°73)
programme.desc: «The Blue Butterfly»The Blue Butterfly: Anna and her friends are on a mission to capture a photograph of a pretty flower, but on the search, they see a beautiful blue butterfly. (S1, ep 73).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Quiet Game) S1 (n°76)
programme.desc: «The Quiet Game»After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Alexandre le petit cousin) S2 (31/52)
programme.desc: «Alexandre le petit cousin»Peppa and George's aunt and uncle have a baby and the whole family is visiting. Expectations are high, but the baby cannot do anything yet. Then Peppa and niece Chloe decide that George could also be a very nice baby ...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le sentier de randonnée) S2 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Le sentier de randonnée»Suzie Sheep comes to play at Peppa's, together with her invisible friend Leo de Leeuw. Peppa has to get used to it, but soon she is playing Suzie's game, just like Papa and Mama Pig. Only George finds it difficult.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ami imaginaire) S2 (37/52)
programme.desc: «L'ami imaginaire»Suzy Sheep has come to play with Peppa. Suzy has made up a pretend friend called "Leo Lion". Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy announces that Leo likes roaring and he likes playing dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along with the game. But Peppa's little brother George cannot see Leo and feels a bit left out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le correspondant) S2 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Le correspondant»Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chloé and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chloé have a great idea;.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête foraine) S3 (24/52)
programme.desc: «La fête foraine»La famille va à la fête foraine, mais maman Cochon est en colère quand les gens à la foire lui disent qu'elle ne sera pas en mesure de gagner les prix en compétition.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les chiffres) S3 (25/52)
programme.desc: «Les chiffres»C'est l'anniversaire de Peppa. Tous ses amis sont invités à la fête. Papa Cochon s'apprête à faire un show extraordinaire pour l'occasion.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Un trou dans la route) S3 (26/52)
programme.desc: «Un trou dans la route»Peppa and her family are trying to get to the playground, but Mr Bull's roadworks are in the way.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Marvelous Moustaches»Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés»Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Mystère et... boulette de viande) S4 (8/20)
programme.desc: «Mystère et... boulette de viande»When Crusher accidentally knocks a bottle of "grow spice" onto a meatball, it grows to an enormous size and rolls away! It's up to Blaze and Pickle to transform into robots and stop the meatball before it wrecks the entire town!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (À vos marques, prêts, rugissez !) S3 (n°14)
programme.desc: «À vos marques, prêts, rugissez !»Blaze and Stripes transform into ferociously fast jungle cats to race in the Animal Island Championship! But to win, they'll have to beat Crusher disguised as a cheating cheetah. Can they claw their way to victory?

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les éléphants apeurés / Le chanteur et les loups) S8 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Les éléphants apeurés / Le chanteur et les loups»A bee frightens some elephants in 'Pups Save The Hiding Elephants', then in 'Pups Save a Yodeler', Wingnut runs away from wolves and ends up trapped in a canyon. (S8, ep 7).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Un train fou dans le désert / Le parcours d'escalarbre) S8 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Un train fou dans le désert / Le parcours d'escalarbre»When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers. // Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Cirque Cosmique / Au fond du gouffre) S2 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Cirque Cosmique / Au fond du gouffre»Sir Steel's circus takes Lady Fluffpot out of this world, can the Deer Squad bring her back to earth safely? // Bobbi gets carried away while digging for ground nuts and puts the forest and its residents in real danger.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Forest Squad in Space) S2 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Forest Squad in Space»An adventure in space awaits the newest heroes in town when the Deer Squad take the Forest Squad with them on a mission.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons) S1 (26/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons»Jonathan has lost his balloon, Paddington tries to get him a new one but accidentally ends up flying all over London. How will he get down? Pigeonton get help! // After a neighborhood watch talk Paddington decides to go on patrol as an unofficial policeman. Soon he has to solve a real crime but who is the litterbug?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Fire Engine / Paddington Joins a Club) S1 (19/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Fire Engine / Paddington Joins a Club»Paddington is impressed by a safety talk from the local fire brigade. When there is a real emergency, Paddington to the rescue! // Mateo and Judy form a secret club in the treehouse but won't let Jonathan and Paddington join without a password.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La journée des jeunes talents) S3 (20/52)
programme.desc: «La journée des jeunes talents»C'est la Journée du talent à la garderie de Peppa. Madame Gazelle veut que chacun montre à la classe son talent particulier...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage sur la Lune) S3 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage sur la Lune»Peppa et George partent avec maman Cochon à la présentation par mademoiselle Lapin du camion des mamans sapeurs pompiers...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Grand-père à l'aire de jeux) S3 (22/52)
programme.desc: «Grand-père à l'aire de jeux»Papa Pig perd son titre de Champion de saut de flaques durant les Papa-Olympics. Tout le monde l'aide à s'entraîner en vue des prochains Papa-Olympics...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Goldie, le poisson rouge) S3 (23/52)
programme.desc: «Goldie, le poisson rouge»Goldie le poisson n'a pas l'air heureux et ne mange pas sa nourriture, alors Peppa, George et Maman Cochon l'emmènent faire un tour en bus pour voir le docteur Hamster, le vétérinaire...

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Robot Toutou !) S6 (12/29)
programme.desc: «Robot Toutou !»Robo Puppy!: When a bossy cyborg named the Glitch hacks all the robots in Robotopolis and forces them to dance "The Robot," it's up to Robot Mechanic Molly and Robo Puppy to stop him! (S6, ep 7).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Into the Blueniverse) S4 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Into the Blueniverse»Into the Blueniverse!: It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into the Blueniverse! Where has it gone? (S3, ep 17).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Rainbow Puppy's Skidoo Adventure) S3 (12/18)
programme.desc: «Rainbow Puppy's Skidoo Adventure»Josh and Blue are having a playdate with our friend Rainbow Puppy, who makes everything extra exciting! We play a special game of Rainbow Puppy's Clues to figure out where she wants to go, leaping from skidoo to skidoo and looking for clues.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Le Carnaval / Le Cheval des Mers) S1 (21/21)
programme.desc: «Le Carnaval / Le Cheval des Mers»The biggest party of the year could be cancelled after Escarlata la Pirata freezes the high seas! // Bonnie Bones is on the run with the museum's priceless treasures, but Santi and crew won't let her get far.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Le chat de la jungle) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Le chat de la jungle»The Ocelot's Tale: A fun sleepover in Larimar's Museum turns into an adventure when one of the pieces of art comes to life. (S2, ep 7b).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Baby, super requin) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Baby, super requin»Vigo's evil plot to turn everyfishy in Carnivore Cove into babies backfires when toddlers Super Shark and Captain Kelp turn out to be a finful.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Medievel Tides) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Medievel Tides»When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Popcorn) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Popcorn»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le tresor du palais de glace / Au secours de Ryder) S8 (9/24)
programme.desc: «Le tresor du palais de glace / Au secours de Ryder»Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in search of an Antarctic treasure but they all need rescued when they get stranded on shore. // The pups need to rescue Ryder and Alex when they get out of control on a rocket-powered ATV.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (La grande décision de Paddington) S2 (6/27)
programme.desc: «La grande décision de Paddington»Paddington and the Big Decision: On the last day of the school holidays, Jonathan and Judy can't agree on what to do, so Paddington has the casting vote. (S2, ep 7a).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La dispute) S2 (43/52)
programme.desc: «La dispute»Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La balle rebondissante) S2 (48/52)
programme.desc: «La balle rebondissante»Peppa and George play with the ball until Suzie comes and they play tennis with it. But George doesn't like that. Fortunately, the friends come by and play a game of football. But a referee must be involved!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La panne de courant) S2 (47/52)
programme.desc: «La panne de courant»One day all the lights suddenly go out and Peppa's house is plunged into darkness. There has been a power cut. Peppa is surprised to find that even the television won't work without electricity. While the family wait for the electricity to come on again, Peppa and George have fun looking for a torch and thinking of games to play in the dark.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Hat) S1 (29/78)
programme.desc: «Froga's Hat»Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Anna's Horse) S1 (30/78)
programme.desc: «Anna's Horse»Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange»While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le Petit Chaperon Arc-en-ciel) S3 (14/18)
programme.desc: «Le Petit Chaperon Arc-en-ciel»Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?"" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups vs. Ouchy Paws / Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party) S8 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Pups vs. Ouchy Paws / Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party»Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard. // Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La fontaine mystérieuse / La soirée des lumières disco) S2 (n°17)
programme.desc: «La fontaine mystérieuse / La soirée des lumières disco»Who has put a new fountain in Crystal Lake which is against Park Rules? And it's upsetting Fish Hook! // Sir Steel thinks the deer have stolen Steel Tower's lights, so decides to take theirs with his new Light Sucker!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Den Build Disaster / Winter Lights) S2 (19/20)
programme.desc: «Den Build Disaster / Winter Lights»Kai tries to impress with his super den, but his leaf blower invention frightens the baby animals. // Lola's plan to help a family of hedgehogs over the winter doesn't go to plan when Sir Steel wants to brighten things up.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's First Snow / Paddington and the Metal Detector) S1 (24/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's First Snow / Paddington and the Metal Detector»It's snowing in Windsor Gardens; Paddington has lost a special wooly hat given him by Aunt Lucy and must find it. // Paddington is given a Metal detector by Mr. Gruber. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Potato Stew) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Potato Stew»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés»Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Hiccupism / Silence please) S1 (32/52)
programme.desc: «Hiccupism / Silence please»Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Filouland / Les chevaliers de la mer profonde) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Filouland / Les chevaliers de la mer profonde»Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Busy Baby) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Busy Baby»Busy Baby: Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark. (S1, ep 14b).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Statue of Friendship) S1 (n°28)
programme.desc: «The Statue of Friendship»Anna is inspired to create a statue of Froga but she runs out of clay. On her search to find more, she and her friends agree to each make their own special statues out of different materials. The best statue to build is one they build together!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Choice) S1 (33/78)
programme.desc: «Froga's Choice»Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Hat) S1 (29/78)
programme.desc: «Froga's Hat»Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Anna's Horse) S1 (30/78)
programme.desc: «Anna's Horse»Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Ron's Sunburn) S1 (55/78)
programme.desc: «Ron's Sunburn»Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them. They even try tempting him with Froga's freshly baked cookies!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Go Find it!) S1 (n°58)
programme.desc: «Go Find it!»Go Find It!: Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, and the first team who does will win the game. (S1, ep 58).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Travailler et s'amuser) S3 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Travailler et s'amuser»Peppa et Suzy comprennent que les adultes doivent travailler toute la journée. Elles font alors semblant de travailler dans une boutique à la garderie et trouvent cette tâche épuisante...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'arc en ciel) S3 (2/52)
programme.desc: «L'arc en ciel»Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La toux de Pedro) S3 (3/52)
programme.desc: «La toux de Pedro»Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and some of the other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Peppa calls Doctor Brown Bear who gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La bibliothèque) S3 (4/52)
programme.desc: «La bibliothèque»Peppa and her family go to the Windy Castle, and when they get there, they have a wonderful view from the top.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Freddy Fox) S3 (27/52)
programme.desc: «Freddy Fox»Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it is Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Apprendre à siffler) S3 (28/52)
programme.desc: «Apprendre à siffler»Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La tortue de la doctoresse Hamster) S3 (29/52)
programme.desc: «La tortue de la doctoresse Hamster»Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets. But Tiddles has run away. But Ms. Rabbit is going to rescue Tiddles.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Great Spring Clean) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «The Great Spring Clean»Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Greedyguts / Where is Bali?) S1 (51/52)
programme.desc: «Greedyguts / Where is Bali?»A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Pneus fabuleux) S4 (10/20)
programme.desc: «Pneus fabuleux»When his tires get popped, Blaze thinks he's out of the race for good. Luckily, Gabby is there with a new set of Power Tires - high-tech wheels that can transform into anything Blaze needs to keep rolling.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La Course au Trésor) S3 (17/20)
programme.desc: «La Course au Trésor»When Crusher tries to get Blazing Speed for himself, he accidentally sends Blaze's engine flying! Now it's Blaze vs. Crusher in a race for Blazing Speed-but without an engine, Blaze must find new ways to propel himself to victory.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Monsieur Hellinger s'illumine / Le portrait de la princesse) S8 (11/24)
programme.desc: «Monsieur Hellinger s'illumine / Le portrait de la princesse»When Mayor Humdinger's giant neon sign of himself gets loose, the Paw Patrol must stop it from rolling through town. // Sweetie steals a painting of the Princess and attempts to replace it with one of herself.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La tulipe poule / Le requin cascadeur) S8 (12/24)
programme.desc: «La tulipe poule / Le requin cascadeur»When Mayor Humdinger and his mother help Mayor Goodway look for a rare tulip, Humdinger's attempts to have his mom find the flower first gets them all in trouble. // The Pups must save Daring Danny X when a mechanical shark stunt that goes awry.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Dinobot / Les Super Minis dans l'espace) S2 (20/20)
programme.desc: «Dinobot / Les Super Minis dans l'espace»Stu & Safia have a new pet which needs training - just one problem: it's a Dinobot and it takes the Deer Squad to stop it! // An adventure in space awaits the newest heroes in town when the Deer Squad take the Forest Squad with them on a mission.
